1671420:
Entrance Door

Be sure that
this area is clean.
1671480:
Tray Bin

Check the tray bins
and replace the
trash bags if you
need to.
1671568:
Baby Chair

Wipe the seat and
table with a clean
counter cloth.
1671656:
The Floors

Pick up trash you
see and sweep up
dust with a broom.
1671748:
Wet Floor Sign

Clean dirty floors
with a mop.
Put out the
wet floor sign.
1671848:
Table

If customers left
trays out, pick
them up and
wipe the table.
1671956:
Tap areas you
should clean.
You will learn
what to do there.
1672088:
How clean &
pretty!

Let's go to
another area.
1672296:
Car Park

Sweep up dirt
with a broom.
1672404:
Entrance Door

Be sure that
this area is clean.
1672468:
Windows

Spray McDonald's
cleaner (12 times
diluted) & clean.
1672536:
Dumpster

Carry trash to the
dumpster. Don't
drag the bag!
1672612:
Tray Bin

Check the tray bins
and replace the
trash bags if you
need to.
1672728:
How clean &

Let's go to

1673096:
Urinal

Wear gloves to
clean the toilet
bowl.
1673152:
Trash Can

Check the trash
bag and replace
if needed.
1673220:
Wet Floor Sign

Put out the wet
floor sign when
mopping.
1673296:
Mirror & Sink

Wipe up dirt and
water splashes.
Refill the soap.
1673376:
Toilet Paper

Check the toilet
paper and refill
if needed.
1673460:
Toilet Bowl

Spray restroom
cleaner, scrub with
brush and rinse.
